postData.contentHtml: Host Jordan Gass-Poore' discusses zombie movies with her friend, Forrest, who was diagnosed with the coronavirus.
postData.title: Down With The Sickness
postData.subtitle: Forrest Has The Coronavirus, Discusses Zombie Movies
postData.description:
Host Jordan Gass-Poore' discusses zombie movies with her friend,
Forrest, who was diagnosed with the coronavirus.
